title: Lyndon B Johnson National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Lyndon B Johnson National Historical Park Commemoration of Lyndon Johnson's Birthday      Time: 10:00 AM Location: LBJ Ranch Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Annually, Every 27th of August  from 08/27/2016 to 08/27/2050 Celebration in honor of the anniversary of Lyndon Johnson's birth. View Details      Lyndon B Johnson National Historical Park Movies Under the Stars - "Around the World in 80 Days"      Time: 7:00 PM Location: LBJ Ranch Fees: Free     Saturday, September 10, 2016 Join us at the LBJ Ranch for a Movie Under the Stars View Details                  Click to download a copy of the entire calendar of events for the year.
